thread.title: Best Buy sales surge but outlook a concern

title: Best Buy sales surge but outlook a concern
text:
Best Buy sales surge but outlook a concern 11:03am EDT - 01:06
Best Buy's quarterly profit and same-store sales surged. But online sales growth slowed, and the company's outlook largely fell shy of estimates. Fred Katayama reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Best Buy's quarterly profit and same-store sales surged. But online sales growth slowed, and the company's outlook largely fell shy of estimates. Fred Katayama reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IM6KRy
